articles.title: Apple’s 14- and 16-inch MacBook Pros might not arrive until next March
articles.description: The M2-equipped 14- and 16-inch MacBook Pros may launch in the first half of March 2023, according to a report from Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman.

articles.title: Apple: Chinese workers flee Covid lockdown at iPhone factory
articles.description: Video shared online shows people jumping a fence to escape the plant, owned by Foxconn, in Zhengzhou.
articles.content:
Workers have broken out of Apple's largest iPhone assembly factory in China after a Covid outbreak forced staff to lockdown at the workplace.

articles.title: Peloton app comes to Wear OS 3 smartwatches
articles.description: Peloton has finally rolled out its digital app to Wear OS 3 smartwatches after ignoring the platform for quite a while.
articles.content:
• The Peloton app is now available on Wear OS 3.
  • For the time being, the app only has a few features, such as monitoring your heart rate.

articles.author: andrew.myrick@futurenet.com (Andrew Myrick)
articles.title: Why I'm done with the iPad
articles.description: After being a proponent and avid user of the iPad for years, the inability to provide a software experience that doesn't just feel like a "big iPhone" has driven a wedge between the iPad and some of its users.
